title: Is human reproduction enough from the NCERT for the NEET 2020? If extra, which book should I refer? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: I think it is sufficient for neet and yes previous yr questions regarding that topic and also read all options if u find any option which is not covered in ncert read about that also… If u want to read extra thn u can refer to ur coaching notes or any guide book but above technique will save ur time …for sure. Thnku
